"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"dm={ \rho  }4\pi { r }^{ 2 }dr"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I=\frac { 2 }{ 3 } \int { (\rho 4\pi  } { r }^{ 2 }dr){ r }^{ 2 }=\frac { 2 }{ 3 } \int { \rho 4\pi  } { r }^{ 4 }dr"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I=\frac { 2 }{ 3 } 4\pi \int { \rho  } { r }^{ 4 }dr"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ r }^{ 5 }=z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5{ r }^{ 4 }dr=dz"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ r }^{ 4 }dr=\frac { dz }{ 5 } =\frac { 2 }{ 3 } \frac { 4\pi  }{ 5 } \int { \rho dz } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Area under the curve = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac { 2 }{ 3 } \frac { 4\pi  }{ 5 } \times \frac { 1 }{ 2 } { \rho  }_{ 0 }{ R }^{ 5 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I=\frac { 2 }{ 3 } \times \frac { 2 }{ 5 } \pi { \rho  }_{ 0 }{ R }^{ 5 }=\boxed{\frac { 4 }{ 15 } \pi { \rho  }_{ 0 }{ R }^{ 5 }}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

title: #2015_13 I just started learning calculus

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"First note that it is valid to consider this "},{"type":"text","text":"infinite tetration","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":"  in the neighborhood of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = \frac{\pi}{4},"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and in this neighborhood "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y = f(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is both continuous and differentiable."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"As such, we then observe that, (since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y \gt 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in this neighborhood), "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\ln(y) = y*\ln(\tan(x)) \Longrightarrow \dfrac{\ln(y)}{y} = \ln(\tan(x))."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Differentiating both sides (using the quotient and chain rules) we have that"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{1 - \ln(y)}{y^{2}} * \dfrac{dy}{dx} = \dfrac{\sec^{2}(x)}{\tan(x)} \Longrightarrow \dfrac{dy}{dx} = \dfrac{y^{2}\sec(x)\csc(x)}{1 - \ln(y)}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now at "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = \frac{\pi}{4} \Longrightarrow \tan(x) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we have that "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y(1) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sec(x) = \csc(x) =\sqrt{2},"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" thus "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f'(\frac{\pi}{4}) = \dfrac{1*2}{1 - 0} = \boxed{2}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: #2015_14  From an old Physics Olympiad!
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consider a long solid, rigid hexagonal prism like a common type of pencil. The mass of the prism is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and is uniformly distributed. The length of each side of cross-sectional hexagon is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". The moment of inertia "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of the hexagonal prism about its central axis is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I=\frac { 5 }{ 12 } M{ a }^{ 2 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" Find the moment of inertia "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of the hexagonal prism about an edge of the prism."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Details and Assumptions","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":":"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M=1 \text{ kg}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a=1 m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"More questions."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I'=I_{cm}+Md^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I'=\frac{5}{12}Ma^{2} + Ma^{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I'=\frac{17}{12}Ma^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I'=17/12"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"PS. This is a very tiny part of that IPhO problem; if anybody wants to solve the full problem, you can find it at IPhO 1998 Problem 1 (Iceland)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: #2015_ 15 Mathematical modelling
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A manufacturer of medicines is preparing a production plan of medicines "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 1 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 2 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". There are sufficient raw materials available to make "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"20000"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" bottles of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 1 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"40000"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" bottles of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 2 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", but there are only "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"45000"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" bottles into which either of the medicines can be put. Further , it takes "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3 hours"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to prepare enough material to fill "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1000"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" bottles of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 1 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" , it takes "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 hour"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to prepare enough material to fill "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1000"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" bottles of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 2 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"66"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" hours available for this operation. The profit is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Rs 8"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" per bottle for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 1 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Rs 7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" per bottle for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ M }_{ 2 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". What is the maximum profit he can achieve? "}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"More questions??","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]}]}

title: 2015 17 From previous KVPY papers!
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" f(x) = \cos(5x) + A\cos(4x) + B\cos(3x) + C\cos(2x) + D\cos(x) + E"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x) "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" denote the function above for constants "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A,B,C,D"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"E"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Given that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"T"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" equals to "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large f\left( 0 \right) -f\left( \frac { \pi  }{ 5 }  \right) +f\left( \frac { 2\pi  }{ 5 }  \right) -f\left( \frac { 3\pi  }{ 5 }  \right) + \cdots+f\left( \frac { 8\pi  }{ 5 }  \right) -f\left( \frac { 9\pi  }{ 5 }  \right) "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Which of the following answer choices shows the property of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"T"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_0 = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1 = A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_2 = B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_3 = C"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_4 = D"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_5 = E"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", then:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \begin{aligned} \Rightarrow f(x) & = \sum_{m=0}^5 a_{5-m} \cos{mx} \\ \Rightarrow T & = \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k f\left( \frac{k\pi}{5} \right) \\ & = \sum_{m=0}^5 \color{#3D99F6}{\sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k} a_{5-m} \color{#3D99F6} {\cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} } \end{aligned}  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consider "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \color{#3D99F6}{\sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":":"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \begin{aligned} \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{k(0)\pi}{5}\right)} & =  \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k \cos{0}  = \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k = 0 \end{aligned}  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1\le m \le 4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we note that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} = - \cos{\left(\frac{(5+km)\pi}{5}\right)} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \begin{aligned} \small \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} & \small = \sum_{k=0}^4 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} + \sum_{k=5}^9 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} \\ & \small = \sum_{k=0}^4 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} + \sum_{k=0}^4 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{(5+km)\pi}{5}\right)} \\ & \small = \sum_{k=0}^4 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} - \sum_{k=0}^4 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{km\pi}{5}\right)} \\ & \small = 0 \end{aligned}  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m=5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":":"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \begin{aligned} \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k \cos{\left(\frac{5k\pi}{5}\right)} & = \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k \cos{k\pi} = \sum_{k=0}^9 (-1)^k (-1)^k = \sum_{k=0}^9 1  = 10 \end{aligned}  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" T = 10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{independent of A, B, C, D and E}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: #2015_18 Lets add it!

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since it appears simple enough to brute force using computer, that is precisely what I did:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"codeBlock","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1
2>>> sum((n+1)*(n+2)*(n+3)*(n+4) for n in range(47))
56377440


"}],"attrs":[{"text":">>> sum((n+1)*(n+2)*(n+3)*(n+4) for n in range(47))
56377440
","language":null}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"While solving, I didn't notice the similarity with the binomial coefficients "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{n}{4}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Lol, I know that feeling. Sometimes it's better to just crawl in to a cave and avoid contact."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hope you feel better!

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            ...that's correct. I concluded too quickly. I guess I shouldn't write solutions when rushed + in a bad mood. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"EDIT: Edited the solution to be less condescending.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

The "},{"type":"text","text":"Hockey Stick Identity","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" would be extremely useful here, since we essentially want to find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sum { i \choose 4 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
